name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. William W. SCHATTENBURG, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.

casebody.head_matter:
424 A.2d 505
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. William W. SCHATTENBURG, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 3, 1980.
Decided Jan. 30, 1981.
Paul Bogdon, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Richard A. Hernán, Dist. Atty., Warren, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
